publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2650♦ Alison McInnes: Safe Drivers are Made, Not Born—That the Parliament welcomes the publication of the Young drivers - where and when they are unsafe report by the IAM motoring trust; notes with dismay the number of young people killed and seriously injured on Scotland’s roads in the last five years, including nearly 100 people aged 17 to 25 in the Grampian area alone; further notes the 10 key recommendations of the IAM report, and believes that schools, young people, road agencies and local and national authorities should work together in order to introduce these measures and improve road safety for all our young drivers. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-2650# Alison McInnes: Safe Drivers are Made, Not Born—That the Parliament welcomes the publication of the Young drivers - where and when they are unsafe report by the IAM motoring trust; notes with dismay the number of young people killed and seriously injured on Scotland’s roads in the last five years, including nearly 100 people aged 17 to 25 in the Grampian area alone; further notes the 10 key recommendations of the IAM report, and believes that schools, young people, road agencies and local and national authorities should work together in order to introduce these measures and improve road safety for all our young drivers. Supported by: Liam McArthur*, Elaine Smith*, Ross Finnie*, Jim Tolson*, Elaine Murray*, Robert Brown*, Bill Kidd*, Aileen Campbell*, Robin Harper*, Angela Constance*, Mary Mulligan*, Mike Pringle*, Nicol Stephen*
S3M-2650# Safe Drivers are Made, Not Born (lodged on 2 October 2008) Jamie Stone*, Dave Thompson*, Kenneth Gibson*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S3M-2650# Safe Drivers are Made, Not Born (lodged on 2 October 2008) Hugh O’Donnell*
S3M-2650# Safe Drivers are Made, Not Born (lodged on 2 October 2008) Stuart McMillan*
S3M-2650# Safe Drivers are Made, Not Born (lodged on 2 October 2008) Tom McCabe*, Cathy Jamieson*, Gil Paterson*, Nanette Milne*
S3M-2650# Safe Drivers are Made, Not Born (lodged on 2 October 2008) Ken Macintosh*
S3M-2650# Safe Drivers are Made, Not Born (lodged on 2 October 2008) Cathy Peattie*

S3M-2650# Alison McInnes: Safe Drivers are Made, Not Born—That the Parliament welcomes the publication of the Young drivers - where and when they are unsafe report by the IAM motoring trust; notes with dismay the number of young people killed and seriously injured on Scotland’s roads in the last five years, including nearly 100 people aged 17 to 25 in the Grampian area alone; further notes the 10 key recommendations of the IAM report, and believes that schools, young people, road agencies and local and national authorities should work together in order to introduce these measures and improve road safety for all our young drivers. Supported by: Liam McArthur, Elaine Smith, Ross Finnie, Jim Tolson, Elaine Murray, Robert Brown, Bill Kidd, Aileen Campbell, Robin Harper, Angela Constance, Mary Mulligan, Mike Pringle, Nicol Stephen, Jamie Stone, Dave Thompson, Kenneth Gibson, Roseanna Cunningham, Hugh O’Donnell, Stuart McMillan, Tom McCabe, Cathy Jamieson, Gil Paterson, Nanette Milne, Ken Macintosh, Cathy Peattie
S3M-2650# Safe Drivers are Made, Not Born (lodged on 2 October 2008) Dr Richard Simpson* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
